item.title: Bin unemptied, 18th August
item.description:
To quote the song ‘how long has this bin going on?’ This bin has been sitting here full for over a month with no one bothering to collect it. It’s starting to accumulate rubbish around it and it looks like an eyesore. If this is a council bin then it needs to be dealt with immediately

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belling Crescent, Ponders End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin overflowing with house hold waste again, 18th August
item.description:
Constant use of the bin by person or persons unknown to dispose of house hold rubbish including food. The question why somebody is using the bin for household rubbish when there is a good household disposal service is a concern to me and should be a concern to bromley council. A camera or some form of a deterrent should be put in place or this will continue.( see previous reports)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heathfield Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet
